summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the UnivNet neural network model’s behavior, covering configuration handling, forward‑pass signatures, batched and unbatched input/output processing, hidden‑state and attention outputs, gradient retention, multi‑GPU data‑parallel execution, and consistency of model outputs.
business_intent: Provide automated quality assurance for the UnivNet model to guarantee reliable performance in audio generation or speech synthesis applications, supporting safe deployment and continuous integration pipelines.
